description: The dashboard provides insights of Azure Data Explorer Cluster Resource overview, key mettrics, usage, tables, cache and ingestion.

panels.description: The aggregated usage in the cluster, out of the total used CPU and memory. To see more details, go to the Usage tab.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let system_databases = dynamic(['KustoMonitoringPersistentDatabase', '$systemdb']); 
let system_users = dynamic(['AAD app id=b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62', 'KustoServiceBuiltInPrincipal']); // b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62 is KustoRunner
let system_cluster_management_applications = dynamic(['Kusto.WinSvc.CM.Svc']); // Kusto Cluster Management
let CommandTable = ADXCommand 
    | where TimeGenerated > datetime(2020-09-09T09:30:00Z) 
    | where LastUpdatedOn > ago(7d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(ResourceUtilization.MemoryPeak) 
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | project-away ResourceUtilization;
let QueryTable = ADXQuery
    | where LastUpdatedOn > ago(7d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(MemoryPeak)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | extend CommandType = 'Query';
let dataset_commands_queries = CommandTable
    | union (QueryTable)
    | project CommandType, DatabaseName, StartedOn, LastUpdatedOn, Duration, State, FailureReason, RootActivityId, User, ApplicationName, Principal, TotalCPU, MemoryPeak, CorrelationId, cluster_name;
let dataset = dataset_commands_queries
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest'
    //| where totimespan(TotalCPU) > totimespan(0)
    | summarize TotalCPU=max(TotalCPU) 
        , MemoryPeak=max(MemoryPeak)
        by User, ApplicationName, CorrelationId 
;
let totalCPU = toscalar(dataset
    | summarize sum((totimespan(TotalCPU) / 1s)));
let totalMemory = toscalar(dataset
    | summarize sum(MemoryPeak));
let topMemory = 
    dataset
    | top-nested 10000 of User with others="Others" by sum(MemoryPeak), top-nested 10000 of ApplicationName with others="Others" by sum(MemoryPeak)
    | extend PercentOfTotalClusterMemoryUsed = aggregated_ApplicationName / toreal(totalMemory)
;
let topCpu = 
    dataset
    | top-nested 10000 of User with others="Others" by sum(totimespan(TotalCPU) / 1s), top-nested 10000 of ApplicationName with others="Others" by sum(totimespan(TotalCPU) / 1s)
    | extend PercentOfTotalClusterCpuUsed = aggregated_ApplicationName / toreal(totalCPU)
;
topMemory
| join kind = fullouter(topCpu) on User, ApplicationName
| extend BothPercentages = PercentOfTotalClusterMemoryUsed + PercentOfTotalClusterCpuUsed
| top 10 by BothPercentages desc
| extend User = case(ApplicationName == "Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc", strcat("Kusto Data Management ", "(", User, ")"),
    ApplicationName == "KustoQueryRunner", strcat("Kusto Query Runner ", "(", User, ")"),
    User == "AAD app id=e0331ea9-83fc-4409-a17d-6375364c3280", "DataMap Agent 001 (app id: e0331ea9-83fc-4409-a17d-6375364c3280)", // Used for internal MS clusters 
    User)
| extend PercentOfTotalClusterMemoryUsed_display = iff(isnan(PercentOfTotalClusterMemoryUsed * 100), toreal(0), PercentOfTotalClusterMemoryUsed * 100)
| extend PercentOfTotalClusterCpuUsed_display = iff(isnan(PercentOfTotalClusterCpuUsed * 100), toreal(0), PercentOfTotalClusterCpuUsed * 100)
| where not (ApplicationName == "Others" and PercentOfTotalClusterMemoryUsed_display == 0 and PercentOfTotalClusterCpuUsed_display == 0)
| project User, ApplicationName, PercentOfTotalClusterMemoryUsed_display, PercentOfTotalClusterCpuUsed_display

panels.title: Top resource consumers

panels.description: Over a sliding timeline window. Not affected by the time range parameter

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let system_databases = dynamic(['KustoMonitoringPersistentDatabase', '$systemdb']); 
let system_users = dynamic(['AAD app id=b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62', 'KustoServiceBuiltInPrincipal']); // b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62 is Kusto Query Runner
let system_cluster_management_applications = dynamic(['Kusto.WinSvc.CM.Svc']); // Kusto Cluster Management
let CommandTable = ADXCommand
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(ResourceUtilization.MemoryPeak) 
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc'
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | project-away ResourceUtilization;
let QueryTable = ADXQuery
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc'
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(MemoryPeak)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | extend CommandType = 'Query';
let dataset_commands_queries = CommandTable
    | union (QueryTable)
    | project CommandType, DatabaseName, StartedOn, LastUpdatedOn, Duration, State,
        FailureReason, RootActivityId, User,
        ApplicationName,
        Principal,
        TotalCPU,
        MemoryPeak,
        CorrelationId,
        cluster_name;
let raw = dataset_commands_queries
    | where LastUpdatedOn > ago(7d)
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest'
    | where StartedOn > ago(365d)
;
raw
| evaluate activity_engagement(User, StartedOn, 1d, 7d)
| join kind = inner (
    raw
    | evaluate activity_engagement(User, StartedOn, 1d, 30d)
    )
    on StartedOn
| project StartedOn, Daily=dcount_activities_inner, Weekly=dcount_activities_outer, Monthly = dcount_activities_outer1     
| where StartedOn > ago(90d)
| project Daily, StartedOn, Weekly, Monthly
| sort by StartedOn asc

panels.title: Unique user count

topMemory
| join kind = fullouter(topCpu) on User, ApplicationName

    User == "AAD app id=e0331ea9-83fc-4409-a17d-6375364c3280", "DataMap Agent 001 (app id: e0331ea9-83fc-4409-a17d-6375364c3280)", // Used for internal MS clusters 
    User)
| extend PercentOfTotalClusterMemoryUsed_display = iff(isnan(PercentOfTotalClusterMemoryUsed * 100), toreal(0), PercentOfTotalClusterMemoryUsed * 100)

panels.title: Top resource consumers (within the CPU and memory consumption of the cluster)
Top principals and applications by command and query count

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let system_databases = dynamic(['KustoMonitoringPersistentDatabase', '$systemdb']); 
let system_users = dynamic(['AAD app id=b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62', 'KustoServiceBuiltInPrincipal']); // b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62 is KustoRunner
let system_cluster_management_applications = dynamic(['Kusto.WinSvc.CM.Svc']); // Kusto Cluster Management
let CommandTable = ADXCommand
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(ResourceUtilization.MemoryPeak)
    | where LastUpdatedOn > ago(7d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | project-away ResourceUtilization;
let QueryTable = ADXQuery
    | where LastUpdatedOn > ago(7d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(MemoryPeak)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | extend CommandType = 'Query';
let dataset_commands_queries = CommandTable
    | union (QueryTable)
    | extend ApplicationName = case(ApplicationName == "Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc", "Kusto Data Management",
        ApplicationName)
    | project CommandType, DatabaseName, StartedOn, LastUpdatedOn, Duration, State,
        FailureReason, RootActivityId, User, ApplicationName, Principal, TotalCPU, MemoryPeak, CorrelationId, cluster_name;
let dataset = dataset_commands_queries
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest'
    | where CommandType != 'TableSetOrAppend'
    | summarize Count=count() by ApplicationName
    | project ApplicationName, Count
    | order by Count desc
    //| top-nested 10 of User with others="Other Values" by agg_User=sum(Count) desc;
    | top-nested 7 of ApplicationName with others="Other Values"  by agg_App=sum(Count) desc;
//|where not (ApplicationName == "Other applications" and agg_App == 0)
//|project-away agg_User;
dataset

panels.title: Top applications by command and query count

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let system_databases = dynamic(['KustoMonitoringPersistentDatabase', '$systemdb']); 
let system_users = dynamic(['AAD app id=b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62', 'KustoServiceBuiltInPrincipal']); // b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62 is KustoRunner

    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(ResourceUtilization.MemoryPeak)
    | where LastUpdatedOn > ago(7d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | project-away ResourceUtilization;
let QueryTable = ADXQuery
    | where LastUpdatedOn > ago(7d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(MemoryPeak)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | extend CommandType = 'Query';
let dataset_commands_queries = CommandTable
    | union (QueryTable)
    | project CommandType, DatabaseName, StartedOn, LastUpdatedOn, Duration, State,
        FailureReason, RootActivityId, User, ApplicationName, Principal, TotalCPU, MemoryPeak, CorrelationId, cluster_name;
let dataset = dataset_commands_queries
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest'
    | where CommandType != 'TableSetOrAppend'

        ApplicationName == "KustoQueryRunner", strcat("Kusto Query Runner ", "(", User, ")"),
        User == "AAD app id=e0331ea9-83fc-4409-a17d-6375364c3280", "DataMap Agent 001 (app id: e0331ea9-83fc-4409-a17d-6375364c3280)", // Used for internal MS clusters 
        User)
    | summarize Count=count() by User
    | project User, Count
    | order by Count desc
    | top-nested 7 of User with others="Other Values" by agg_User=sum(Count) desc;
dataset

let system_databases = dynamic(['KustoMonitoringPersistentDatabase', '$systemdb']); 
let system_users = dynamic(['AAD app id=b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62', 'KustoServiceBuiltInPrincipal']); // b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62 is KustoRunner

    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(ResourceUtilization.MemoryPeak)
    | where LastUpdatedOn > ago(7d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | project-away ResourceUtilization;
let QueryTable = ADXQuery
    | where LastUpdatedOn > ago(7d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(MemoryPeak)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | extend CommandType = 'Query';
let dataset_commands_queries = CommandTable
    | union (QueryTable)
    | project CommandType, DatabaseName, StartedOn, LastUpdatedOn, Duration, State,
        FailureReason, RootActivityId, User, ApplicationName, Principal, TotalCPU, MemoryPeak, CorrelationId, cluster_name;
let dataset = dataset_commands_queries
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest'

panels.title: Queries and top commands by command type

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let system_databases = dynamic(['KustoMonitoringPersistentDatabase', '$systemdb']); 
let system_users = dynamic(['AAD app id=b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62', 'KustoServiceBuiltInPrincipal']); // b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62 is KustoRunner
let system_cluster_management_applications = dynamic(['Kusto.WinSvc.CM.Svc']); // Kusto Cluster Management
let CommandTable = ADXCommand
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(17d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(ResourceUtilization.MemoryPeak)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | project-away ResourceUtilization;
let QueryTable = ADXQuery
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(17d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(MemoryPeak)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | extend CommandType = 'Query';
let dataset_commands_queries = CommandTable
    | union (QueryTable)
    | project CommandType, DatabaseName, StartedOn, LastUpdatedOn, Duration, State,
        FailureReason, RootActivityId, User, ApplicationName, Principal, TotalCPU, MemoryPeak, CorrelationId, cluster_name;
let dataset = dataset_commands_queries
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest';
let FullList = dataset
    | where CommandType != 'TableSetOrAppend';
let Last24Hours =
    FullList
    | where StartedOn >= ago(1d) and StartedOn < now()
    | summarize Count=count() by User, ApplicationName
    | top 100 by Count desc
;
let HistoricalDailyAverage =
    FullList
    | where StartedOn >= ago(16d) and StartedOn < ago(1d)
    | summarize Count=count() / 15.0 by User, ApplicationName
    | top 100 by Count desc
;
let TimeRangeComparison =
    Last24Hours
    | join kind=leftouter (HistoricalDailyAverage) on User, ApplicationName
    | project User=coalesce(User, User1), ApplicationName, Last24Hours=Count, HistoricalDailyAverage=round(Count1, 0)
    | extend PercentChange=round((Last24Hours - HistoricalDailyAverage) / toreal(HistoricalDailyAverage), 2)
    | top 10 by Last24Hours desc
;
TimeRangeComparison
| extend User = case(ApplicationName == "Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc", strcat("Kusto Data Management ", "(", User, ")"),
    ApplicationName == "KustoQueryRunner", strcat("Kusto Query Runner ", "(", User, ")"),
    User == "AAD app id=e0331ea9-83fc-4409-a17d-6375364c3280", "DataMap Agent 001 (app id: e0331ea9-83fc-4409-a17d-6375364c3280)", // Used for internal MS clusters 
    User)
| project User, ApplicationName, HistoricalDailyAverage=round(HistoricalDailyAverage, 0), Last24Hours, PercentChange
| order by Last24Hours desc

panels.title: Changes in query count by principal (not affected by the the time range parameter)

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let system_databases = dynamic(['KustoMonitoringPersistentDatabase', '$systemdb']); 
let system_users = dynamic(['AAD app id=b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62', 'KustoServiceBuiltInPrincipal']); // b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62 is Kusto Quert Runner
let system_cluster_management_applications = dynamic(['Kusto.WinSvc.CM.Svc']); // Kusto Cluster Management
let CommandTable = ADXCommand
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(ResourceUtilization.MemoryPeak)
    | where LastUpdatedOn > ago(7d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | project-away ResourceUtilization;
let QueryTable = ADXQuery
    | where LastUpdatedOn > ago(7d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(MemoryPeak)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | extend CommandType = 'Query';
let dataset_commands_queries = CommandTable
    | union (QueryTable)
    | project CommandType, DatabaseName, StartedOn, LastUpdatedOn, Duration, State,
        FailureReason, RootActivityId, User, ApplicationName, Principal, TotalCPU, MemoryPeak, CorrelationId, cluster_name;
let dataset = dataset_commands_queries
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest';
dataset
| where CommandType != 'TableSetOrAppend' and State == 'Failed'
| summarize Count=count() by User, ApplicationName
| top 10 by Count desc
| extend User = case(ApplicationName == "Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc", strcat("Kusto Data Management ", "(", User, ")"),
    ApplicationName == "KustoQueryRunner", strcat("Kusto Query Runner ", "(", User, ")"),
    User == "AAD app id=e0331ea9-83fc-4409-a17d-6375364c3280", "DataMap Agent 001 (app id: e0331ea9-83fc-4409-a17d-6375364c3280)", // Used for internal MS clusters 
    User)
| order by Count desc

let system_databases = dynamic(['KustoMonitoringPersistentDatabase', '$systemdb']); 
let system_users = dynamic(['AAD app id=b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62', 'KustoServiceBuiltInPrincipal']); // b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62 is Kusto Query Runner
let system_cluster_management_applications = dynamic(['Kusto.WinSvc.CM.Svc']); // Kusto Cluster Management
let CommandTable = ADXCommand
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(ResourceUtilization.MemoryPeak)
    | where StartedOn > ago(7d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | project-away ResourceUtilization;
let QueryTable = ADXQuery
    | where StartedOn > ago(7d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(MemoryPeak)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | extend CommandType = 'Query';
let dataset_commands_queries = CommandTable
    | union (QueryTable)
    | project CommandType, DatabaseName, StartedOn, LastUpdatedOn, Duration, State,
        FailureReason, RootActivityId, User, ApplicationName, Principal, TotalCPU, MemoryPeak, CorrelationId, cluster_name;
let dataset = dataset_commands_queries
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest';
let FullList = dataset
    | where CommandType != 'TableSetOrAppend'
    | project User, StartedOn, ApplicationName, CommandType
;
let Top =
    dataset
    | summarize Count=count() by User
    | top 10 by Count desc
    | extend OriginalUser = User
    | extend Category=User
;
FullList
| join kind=leftouter(Top) on $left.User == $right.OriginalUser
| project User=coalesce(Category, 'Other'), ApplicationName, CommandType, StartedOn
| extend User = case(ApplicationName == "Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc", strcat("Kusto Data Management ", "(", User, ")"),
    ApplicationName == "KustoQueryRunner", strcat("Kusto Query Runner ", "(", User, ")"),
    User == "AAD app id=e0331ea9-83fc-4409-a17d-6375364c3280", "DataMap Agent 001 (app id: e0331ea9-83fc-4409-a17d-6375364c3280)", // Used for internal MS clusters 
    User)
| summarize count() by User, bin(StartedOn, 1h)
| summarize sum(count_) by bin(StartedOn, 1h), tostring(User)
| sort by StartedOn asc

let system_databases = dynamic(['KustoMonitoringPersistentDatabase', '$systemdb']); 
let system_users = dynamic(['AAD app id=b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62', 'KustoServiceBuiltInPrincipal']); // b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62 is Kusto Query Runner
let system_cluster_management_applications = dynamic(['Kusto.WinSvc.CM.Svc']); // Kusto Cluster Management
let CommandTable = ADXCommand
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(ResourceUtilization.MemoryPeak)
    | where StartedOn > ago(7d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | project-away ResourceUtilization;
let QueryTable = ADXQuery
    | where StartedOn > ago(7d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(MemoryPeak)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | extend CommandType = 'Query';
let dataset_commands_queries = CommandTable
    | union (QueryTable)
    | project CommandType, DatabaseName, StartedOn, LastUpdatedOn, Duration, State,
        FailureReason, RootActivityId, User, ApplicationName, Principal, TotalCPU, MemoryPeak, CorrelationId, cluster_name;
let dataset = dataset_commands_queries
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest';
let FullList = dataset
    | where CommandType != 'TableSetOrAppend'
    | project User, ApplicationName, CommandType, StartedOn, MemoryPeak
    | extend User = case(ApplicationName == "Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc", strcat("Kusto Data Management ", "(", User, ")"),
        ApplicationName == "KustoQueryRunner", strcat("Kusto Query Runner ", "(", User, ")"),
        User == "AAD app id=e0331ea9-83fc-4409-a17d-6375364c3280", "DataMap Agent 001 (app id: e0331ea9-83fc-4409-a17d-6375364c3280)", // Used for internal MS clusters 
        User)
;
let Top =
    FullList
    | summarize Memory=sum(MemoryPeak) by User
    | top 10 by Memory desc
    | extend OriginalUser = User
    | project OriginalUser, Category=User
;
FullList
| join kind=leftouter(Top) on $left.User == $right.OriginalUser
| project User=coalesce(Category, 'Other'), StartedOn, MemoryPeakGB=MemoryPeak / 1024.0 / 1024.0 / 1024.0
| summarize MemoryPeakGB=sum(MemoryPeakGB) by User, bin(StartedOn, 1h)
| summarize sum(MemoryPeakGB) by bin(StartedOn, 1h), tostring(User)
| sort by StartedOn asc

let system_databases = dynamic(['KustoMonitoringPersistentDatabase', '$systemdb']); 
let system_users = dynamic(['AAD app id=b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62', 'KustoServiceBuiltInPrincipal']); // b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62 is Kusto Query Runner
let system_cluster_management_applications = dynamic(['Kusto.WinSvc.CM.Svc']); // Kusto Cluster Management
let CommandTable = ADXCommand
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(ResourceUtilization.MemoryPeak)
    | where StartedOn > ago(7d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | project-away ResourceUtilization;
let QueryTable = ADXQuery
    | where StartedOn > ago(7d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(MemoryPeak)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | extend CommandType = 'Query';
let dataset_commands_queries = CommandTable
    | union (QueryTable)
    | project CommandType, DatabaseName, StartedOn, LastUpdatedOn, Duration, State,
        FailureReason, RootActivityId, User, ApplicationName, Principal, TotalCPU, MemoryPeak, CorrelationId, cluster_name;
let dataset = dataset_commands_queries
    | where StartedOn > ago(7d)
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest';
let FullList = dataset
    | where CommandType != 'TableSetOrAppend'
    | project User, ApplicationName, CommandType, StartedOn, TotalCPU
    | extend User = case(ApplicationName == "Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc", strcat("Kusto Data Management ", "(", User, ")"),
        ApplicationName == "KustoQueryRunner", strcat("Kusto Query Runner ", "(", User, ")"),
        User == "AAD app id=e0331ea9-83fc-4409-a17d-6375364c3280", "DataMap Agent 001 (app id: e0331ea9-83fc-4409-a17d-6375364c3280)", // Used for internal MS clusters 
        User)
;
let Top =
    FullList
    | summarize TotalCpu=sum(totimespan(TotalCPU)) by User
    | top 10 by TotalCpu desc
    | extend OriginalUser = User
    | project OriginalUser, Category=User
;
FullList
| join kind=leftouter(Top) on $left.User == $right.OriginalUser
| project User=coalesce(Category, 'Other'), StartedOn, TotalCpuMinutes=totimespan(TotalCPU) / 1m
| summarize TotalCpuMinutes=sum(TotalCpuMinutes) by User, bin(StartedOn, 1h)
| top-nested of bin(StartedOn, 1h) by sum(TotalCpuMinutes), top-nested 5 of User with others="Other Values" by sum_TotalCpuMinutes=sum(TotalCpuMinutes) desc
| sort by StartedOn asc
| project StartedOn, User, sum_TotalCpuMinutes

let system_databases = dynamic(['KustoMonitoringPersistentDatabase', '$systemdb']); 
let system_users = dynamic(['AAD app id=b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62', 'KustoServiceBuiltInPrincipal']); // b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62 is Kusto Query Runner
let system_cluster_management_applications = dynamic(['Kusto.WinSvc.CM.Svc']); // Kusto Cluster Management
let CommandTable = ADXCommand
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(ResourceUtilization.MemoryPeak)
    | where StartedOn > ago(7d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | project-away ResourceUtilization;
let QueryTable = ADXQuery
    | where StartedOn > ago(7d)
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(MemoryPeak)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | extend CommandType = 'Query';
let dataset_commands_queries = CommandTable
    | union (QueryTable)
    | extend ApplicationName = case(ApplicationName == "Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc", "Kusto Data Management", ApplicationName)
    | project CommandType, DatabaseName, StartedOn, LastUpdatedOn, Duration, State,
        FailureReason, RootActivityId, User, ApplicationName, Principal, TotalCPU, MemoryPeak, CorrelationId, cluster_name;
let dataset = dataset_commands_queries
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest';
let FullList = dataset
    | where CommandType != 'TableSetOrAppend'
    | project ApplicationName, StartedOn, CommandType, User
;
let Top =
    FullList
    | summarize Count=count() by ApplicationName
    | top 10 by Count desc
    | extend Category=ApplicationName
;
FullList
| join kind=leftouter(Top) on ApplicationName 
| project Application=coalesce(Category, '-'), CommandType, User, StartedOn
| summarize count() by Application, bin(StartedOn, 1h)
| summarize sum(count_) by bin(StartedOn, time(1h)), tostring(Application)
| sort by StartedOn asc

    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")

let system_databases = dynamic(['KustoMonitoringPersistentDatabase', '$systemdb']); 
let system_users = dynamic(['AAD app id=b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62', 'KustoServiceBuiltInPrincipal']); // b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62 is Kusto Query Runner
let system_cluster_management_applications = dynamic(['Kusto.WinSvc.CM.Svc']); // Kusto Cluster Management
let commandTable = 
    ADXCommand 
    | where StartedOn > ago(7d)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest'
    | project User, StartedOn, ApplicationName, CommandType, WorkloadGroup
;
let queryTable = 
    ADXQuery 
    | where StartedOn > ago(7d)
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest'
    | extend CommandType = 'Query'
    | project User, StartedOn, ApplicationName, CommandType, WorkloadGroup;
let FullList = commandTable
    | union (queryTable)
    | extend ApplicationName = case(ApplicationName == "Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc", "Kusto Data Management", ApplicationName)
    | project User, StartedOn, ApplicationName, CommandType, WorkloadGroup;
let Top =
    FullList
    | summarize Count=count() by WorkloadGroup
    | top 10 by Count desc
    | distinct WorkloadGroup
;
FullList
| project WorkloadGroup = iff((WorkloadGroup in(Top)) == true, WorkloadGroup, 'Other'), CommandType, StartedOn
| make-series count() on StartedOn from ago(7d) to now() step 1h by WorkloadGroup

panels.title: Command + query count by workload group

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let system_databases = dynamic(['KustoMonitoringPersistentDatabase', '$systemdb']); 
let system_users = dynamic(['AAD app id=b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62', 'KustoServiceBuiltInPrincipal']); // b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62 is Kusto Query Runner
let system_cluster_management_applications = dynamic(['Kusto.WinSvc.CM.Svc']); // Kusto Cluster Management
let commandTable = 
    ADXCommand
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where StartedOn > ago(7d)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest'
    | extend MemoryPeak = tolong(ResourceUtilization.MemoryPeak)
    | project User, ApplicationName, CommandType, StartedOn, MemoryPeak, WorkloadGroup
;
let queryTable = 
    ADXQuery 
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where StartedOn > ago(7d)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest'
    | extend CommandType = 'Query'
    | project User, ApplicationName, CommandType, StartedOn, MemoryPeak, WorkloadGroup;
let FullList = commandTable
    | union (queryTable)
    | extend ApplicationName = case(ApplicationName == "Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc", "Kusto Data Management", ApplicationName)
    | project User, ApplicationName, CommandType, StartedOn, MemoryPeak, WorkloadGroup;
let Top =
    FullList
    | summarize Memory=sum(MemoryPeak) by WorkloadGroup
    | top 10 by Memory desc
    | distinct WorkloadGroup
;
FullList
| project WorkloadGroup = iff((WorkloadGroup in(Top)) == true, WorkloadGroup, 'Other'), CommandType, User, StartedOn, MemoryPeakGB=MemoryPeak / 1024.0 / 1024.0 / 1024.0
| make-series MemoryPeakGB=sum(MemoryPeakGB) on StartedOn from ago(7d) to now() step 1h by WorkloadGroup

let system_databases = dynamic(['KustoMonitoringPersistentDatabase', '$systemdb']); 
let system_users = dynamic(['AAD app id=b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62', 'KustoServiceBuiltInPrincipal']); // b753584e-c468-4503-852a-374280ce7a62 is Kusto Query Runner
let system_cluster_management_applications = dynamic(['Kusto.WinSvc.CM.Svc']); // Kusto Cluster Management
let commandTable = 
    ADXCommand
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where StartedOn > ago(7d)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest'
    | project User, ApplicationName, CommandType, StartedOn, TotalCPU, WorkloadGroup
;
let queryTable = 
    ADXQuery 
    | where ((false == "false" and ApplicationName != 'Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc') or false == "true")
    | where DatabaseName !in (system_databases) and User !in (system_users) and ApplicationName !in (system_cluster_management_applications)
    | where StartedOn > ago(7d)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest'
    | extend CommandType = 'Query'
    | project User, ApplicationName, CommandType, StartedOn, TotalCPU, WorkloadGroup;
let FullList = commandTable
    | union (queryTable)
    | extend ApplicationName = case(ApplicationName == "Kusto.WinSvc.DM.Svc", "Kusto Data Management", ApplicationName)
    | project User, ApplicationName, CommandType, StartedOn, totimespan(TotalCPU), WorkloadGroup;
let Top =
    FullList
    | summarize TotalCpu=sum(TotalCPU) by WorkloadGroup
    | top 10 by TotalCpu desc
    | distinct WorkloadGroup
;
FullList
| project WorkloadGroup = iff((WorkloadGroup in(Top)) == true, WorkloadGroup, 'Other'), StartedOn, TotalCpuMinutes=totimespan(TotalCPU) / 1m
| make-series TotalCpuMinutes=sum(TotalCpuMinutes) on StartedOn from ago(7d) to now() step 1h by WorkloadGroup

ADXTableDetails 
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(1d)
| project TimeGenerated,
    DatabaseName,
    TableName,
    RetentionPolicyOrigin,
    CachingPolicyOrigin,
    OriginalSize = TotalOriginalSize, 
    TotalExtentSize, 
    HotExtentSize = HotExtentSize, 
    RowCount = TotalRowCount, 
    ExtentCount = TotalExtentCount,
    SoftDelete = format_timespan(totimespan(todynamic(RetentionPolicy).SoftDeletePeriod), 'd'),
    HotCache = format_timespan(totimespan(todynamic(CachingPolicy).DataHotSpan), 'd')      
| extend CompressionRatio = round(toreal(OriginalSize) / TotalExtentSize, 1)
| extend SoftDelete = iff(RetentionPolicyOrigin == "default" and isempty(SoftDelete), "unlimited", SoftDelete)
| extend HotCache = iff(CachingPolicyOrigin == "default" and isempty(HotCache), "unlimited", HotCache)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by DatabaseName, TableName
| top 351 by HotExtentSize desc
| project DatabaseName,
    TableName,
    RowCount, 
    HotExtentSize,
    SoftDelete,
    HotCache,
    OriginalSize, 
    TotalExtentSize,
    CompressionRatio, 
    ExtentCount

let TotalRowCountTable = ADXTableDetails
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
    | project Time = TimeGenerated, Category = strcat(TableName, " (DB: ", DatabaseName, ")"), Value = toreal(TotalRowCount);
let topCategories = 
    TotalRowCountTable
    | summarize sum(Value) by Category
    | top 9 by sum_Value desc
;
TotalRowCountTable
| join kind = leftouter (topCategories) on Category
| project Category = coalesce(Category1, 'Other Tables'), Value, Time
| summarize max(Value) by Category, bin(Time, 1h)

let HotExtentSizeTable = ADXTableDetails
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
    | project Time = TimeGenerated, Category = strcat(TableName, " (DB: ", DatabaseName, ")"), Value = HotExtentSize;
let topCategories = 
    HotExtentSizeTable
    | summarize sum(Value) by Category
    | top 9 by sum_Value desc;
HotExtentSizeTable
| join kind = leftouter (topCategories) on Category
| project Category = coalesce(Category1, 'Other Tables'), Value, Time
| summarize max(Value) by Category, bin(Time, 1h)

panels.title: Top tables by hot cache size

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let TotalExtentCountTable = ADXTableDetails
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
    | project Time = TimeGenerated, Category = strcat(TableName, " (DB: ", DatabaseName, ")"), Value = toreal(TotalExtentCount);
let topCategories = 
    TotalExtentCountTable
    | summarize sum(Value) by Category
    | top 9 by sum_Value desc
;
TotalExtentCountTable
| join kind = leftouter (topCategories) on Category
| project Category = coalesce(Category1, 'Other Tables'), Value, Time
| summarize max(Value) by Category, bin(Time, 1h)

let TotalExtentSizeTable = ADXTableDetails
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
    | project Time = TimeGenerated, Category = strcat(TableName, " (DB: ", DatabaseName, ")"), Value = TotalExtentSize;
let topCategories = 
    TotalExtentSizeTable
    | summarize sum(Value) by Category
    | top 9 by sum_Value desc;
TotalExtentSizeTable
| join kind = leftouter (topCategories) on Category
| project Category = coalesce(Category1, 'Other Tables'), Value, Time
| summarize max(Value) by Category, bin(Time, 1h)

panels.description:
This page presents data based on the Time Range parameter. You can change the Time Range parameter to present data starting from 05/25/21 ,11:38 PM (based on your oldest diagnostic logs data).
  The table names and the Cache policy column refreshes every 8 hours.
  Notice the queries statistics presented are based only on queries that scanned data. For instance queries that failed, and queries with time operator of future don't scan any data therefore would not be part of the queries statistics presented.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let TableUsageStatsWithLookBack = ADXTableUsageStatistics
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
    | extend LookBackPeriod = datetime_diff('day', StartedOn, MinCreatedOn) 
    | summarize CountQueries=count() by DatabaseName, TableName, LookBackPeriod;
let sumAllQueries = TableUsageStatsWithLookBack
    | summarize sumQueries=sum(CountQueries) by DatabaseName, TableName;
let percentileLookBackTable= TableUsageStatsWithLookBack
    | summarize percentile_LookbackDuration_ = percentilesw(LookBackPeriod, CountQueries, 95) by DatabaseName, TableName;
let defaultRetention = 365d * 10;
ADXTableDetails 
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(1d) // so we filter out tables that are deprecated
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by DatabaseName, TableName
| extend RetentionPolicy = iff(isnull(RetentionPolicy) or RetentionPolicy == "null", defaultRetention, totimespan(parse_json(tostring(RetentionPolicy)).SoftDeletePeriod)),
    CachingPolicy = iff(isnull(CachingPolicy) or RetentionPolicy == "null", defaultRetention, totimespan(parse_json(tostring(CachingPolicy)).DataHotSpan))
| extend ActiveCachingPolicy = min_of(CachingPolicy, RetentionPolicy)
| join kind = leftouter (percentileLookBackTable) on DatabaseName, TableName
| join kind = leftouter (sumAllQueries) on DatabaseName, TableName
| where DatabaseName != "KustoMonitoringPersistentDatabase"
| top 351 by HotExtentSize desc
| project DatabaseName, TableName, CacheSize = HotExtentSize, format_timespan(ActiveCachingPolicy, 'd'),  
    sumQueries=sumQueries, QueryPeriod = percentile_LookbackDuration_

panels.title: Table usage details

azureLogAnalytics.query:
//SucceededIngestion
//| where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
//| parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
//| where cluster_name == 'mitulktest'
//| summarize count=dcount(IngestionSourcePath) by Database, Table
//| order by ['count'],Database, Table
let tenant=
    FailedIngestion
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest'
    | distinct TenantId
    | take 1; //choose one tenant as logs are transferred to many tenants which represents workSpace
let failures = FailedIngestion
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest'
    | where TenantId == toscalar(tenant)
    | summarize f_count=count() by Database, Table;
let tenant_success=
    SucceededIngestion
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest'
    | distinct TenantId
    | take 1; //choose one tenant as logs are transferred to many tenants which represents workSpace
let success = SucceededIngestion
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
    | parse _ResourceId with * "providers/microsoft.kusto/clusters/" cluster_name
    | where cluster_name == 'mitulktest'
    | where TenantId == toscalar(tenant_success)
    | summarize s_count=count() by Database, Table;
success
| join kind=leftouter failures on Database, Table
| extend f_count = iif(isnull(f_count), 0, f_count)
| extend s_count = iif(isnull(s_count), 0, s_count)
| extend overall = iif(isnull(s_count), 0.0, s_count * 100.0 / (s_count + f_count))
| project Database, Table, s_count, overall
| order by s_count, Database, Table

panels.description: Time from when a message is discovered by Azure Data Explorer, until its content is received by the Engine Storage for processing.
